entities.name: emmeline vance
entities.description: Emmeline Vance is mentioned as someone Harry has met.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as one of the people in the picture.

entities.name: benjy fenwick
entities.description: Benjy Fenwick is mentioned as someone who was killed and only found in bits.

entities.name: edgar bones
entities.description: Edgar Bones is mentioned as a great wizard and brother of Amelia Bones.

entities.name: amelia bones
entities.description: Amelia Bones is mentioned as the sister of Edgar Bones.

entities.name: sturgis podmore
entities.description: Sturgis Podmore is mentioned as someone who looks young in the picture.

entities.name: caradoc dearborn
entities.description: Caradoc Dearborn is mentioned as someone who vanished six months after the picture was taken.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as looking exactly the same as ever in the picture.

entities.name: elphias doge
entities.description: Elphias Doge is mentioned as someone Harry has met and used to wear a stupid hat.

entities.name: gideon prewett
entities.description: Gideon Prewett is mentioned as someone who fought like a hero with his brother Fabian.

entities.name: fabian prewett
entities.description: Fabian Prewett is mentioned as Gideon's brother and someone who fought like a hero.

relationships.description: Elphias Doge is someone Harry has met.
Gideon Prewett and Fabian Prewett are brothers.
Edgar Bones is the brother of Amelia Bones.
